page.title: 16 SOME LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: BRITISH CHROME AND CHEMICALS LTD. is a major manufacturer of a wide range of chromium chemicals, developed from imported chromite ore, which are sold in the U.K. and throughout the world. The industry was started on the site at Urlay Nook 150 years ago by Robert Wilson, a local farmer, to manufacture sulphuric acid and artificial fertilisers. LYONS TETLEY is the largest tea bag manufacturer in Europe. The tea is either purchased in the London tea auctions or from the country of origin such as India or Kenya. Teas are blended together for taste and colour. It is tasted every one and a half hours. Machines pack the tea into various pack sizes, for distribution throughout Britain and exportation to Canada. Computers are used in the factory in all stages of the work.
